feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: Hello! I'm a PhD student in Statistics at the [University of Munich (LMU)](https://www.lmu.de/en/), where I study the foundations of prediction systems used to guide resource allocations in the public sector. A core theme of my research is thinking holistically about decision-making systems, examining not just the predictive algorithms themselves but how they are designed, deployed, and integrated into broader decision-making processes.
